name: @rengine/python-adapters
description: Python adapters for Rengine - Qt GUI, Blender addon, and CLI tools

scripts.install:all: bun app-qt:install && bun blender:install && bun app-cli:install
scripts.test:all: bun app-qt:test && bun blender:test && bun app-cli:test
scripts.check:all: bun app-qt:check && bun blender:check && bun app-cli:check
scripts.lint:all: bun app-qt:lint && bun blender:lint && bun app-cli:lint
scripts.format:all: bun app-qt:format && bun blender:format && bun app-cli:format
scripts.type:all: bun app-qt:type && bun blender:type && bun app-cli:type
scripts.clean:all: bun app-qt:clean && bun blender:clean && bun app-cli:clean
scripts.ipl:quickstart: bun ipl-to-godot:info && bun ipl-to-godot:setup:godot && bun ipl-to-godot:setup:rust
scripts.app-qt:run: cd app-qt && uv run python -m application.main
scripts.app-qt:build: cd app-qt && uv run python build.py
scripts.app-qt:check: cd app-qt && uv run python -m py_compile application/**/*.py && uv run python -c "import application.main; print('✓ Import check passed')"
scripts.app-qt:lint: cd app-qt && uv run ruff check .
scripts.app-qt:format: cd app-qt && uv run ruff check --fix . && uv run ruff format .
scripts.app-qt:type: cd app-qt && uv run ty check .
scripts.app-qt:clean: cd app-qt && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete && rm -rf .venv
scripts.blender:build: cd blender && uv run python build.py
scripts.blender:check: cd blender && uv run python -c "import gtaLib.dff; import gtaLib.img; print('✓ DragonFF import check passed')"
scripts.blender:lint: cd blender && uv run ruff check .
scripts.blender:format: cd blender && uv run ruff check --fix . && uv run ruff format .
scripts.blender:type: cd blender && uv run ty check .
scripts.blender:clean: cd blender && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete && rm -rf .venv
scripts.app-cli:run: cd app-cli && uv run python cli.py
scripts.app-cli:check: cd app-cli && uv run python -c "import cli; from cli import RengineCLI; print('✓ CLI functionality check passed')"
scripts.app-cli:lint: cd app-cli && uv run ruff check .
scripts.app-cli:format: cd app-cli && uv run ruff check --fix . && uv run ruff format .
scripts.app-cli:type: cd app-cli && uv run ty check .
scripts.app-cli:help: cd app-cli && uv run python cli.py --help
scripts.app-cli:clean: cd app-cli && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find . -name '*.pyc' -delete && rm -rf .venv
scripts.gta:test:img: cd app-cli && python3 cli.py img info /home/blefnk/Documents/reliverse/rengine/preloaded/resources/gta-sa/custom.img
scripts.gta:test:dff: cd app-cli && find /home/blefnk/Documents/reliverse/rengine/preloaded/resources/gta-sa -name '*.dff' -size -100k | head -1 | xargs python3 cli.py dff info
scripts.gta:test:batch: cd app-cli && python3 cli.py batch analyze /home/blefnk/Documents/reliverse/rengine/preloaded/resources/gta-sa --format dff --max-files 5
scripts.dff-to-obj:convert:gta-sa: cd app-cli && mkdir -p /home/blefnk/B/R/reliverse/rengine/examples/obj/gta-sa-models && python3 -c "from rengine_cli.modules.dff_to_obj import DFFToOBJConverter; import glob; files = glob.glob('/home/blefnk/Documents/reliverse/rengine/preloaded/resources/gta-sa/**/*.dff', recursive=True); result = DFFToOBJConverter.batch_convert(files[:50], '/home/blefnk/B/R/reliverse/rengine/examples/obj/gta-sa-models', max_workers=8); print('Conversion complete:', result['successful'], '/', result['files_to_convert'], 'files (', result['skipped_files'], 'skipped,', result['failed'], 'failed)')"
scripts.dff-to-obj:convert:all: cd app-cli && mkdir -p /home/blefnk/B/R/reliverse/rengine/examples/obj/gta-sa-models && python3 -c "from rengine_cli.modules.dff_to_obj import DFFToOBJConverter; import glob; files = glob.glob('/home/blefnk/Documents/reliverse/rengine/preloaded/resources/gta-sa/**/*.dff', recursive=True); print('Found', len(files), 'DFF files, starting conversion...'); result = DFFToOBJConverter.batch_convert(files, '/home/blefnk/B/R/reliverse/rengine/examples/obj/gta-sa-models', max_workers=12); print('Conversion complete:', result['successful'], '/', result['files_to_convert'], 'files (', result['skipped_files'], 'skipped,', result['failed'], 'failed)')"
scripts.dff-to-obj:convert:file: cd app-cli && echo 'Usage: bun dff-to-obj:convert:file --file=path/to/file.dff --output=path/to/output.obj [--txd=path/to/file.txd]' && exit 1
scripts.dff-to-obj:test: cd app-cli && find /home/blefnk/Documents/reliverse/rengine/preloaded/resources/gta-sa -name '*.dff' -size -100k | head -1 | xargs -I {} bash -c 'dff="{}"; base=$(basename "$dff" .dff); python3 run_cli.py dff-to-obj "$dff" --output "/tmp/${base}.obj" 2>/dev/null && echo "✓ Test conversion successful: /tmp/${base}.obj" || echo "✗ Test conversion failed"'
scripts.dff-to-obj:analyze: cd app-cli && find /home/blefnk/Documents/reliverse/rengine/preloaded/resources/gta-sa -name '*.dff' -size -100k | head -1 | xargs python3 cli.py dff analyze
scripts.dff-to-obj:setup:pillow: echo 'Install PIL/Pillow for texture extraction:' && echo '  pip install pillow' && echo '  # or' && echo '  uv add pillow'
scripts.dff-to-obj:info: echo 'DFF to OBJ Converter - Converts GTA DFF models to OBJ format' && echo 'Features: Automatic TXD detection, GTA SA CSV integration' && echo 'Docs: ./(docs)/DFF_TO_OBJ.md' && echo 'Usage: bun dff:workflow'
scripts.ipl-to-godot:convert:file: cd app-cli && echo 'Usage: bun ipl-to-godot:convert:file --file=path/to/file.ipl --output=path/to/output.tscn' && exit 1
scripts.ipl-to-godot:test: cd app-cli && find /home/blefnk/Documents/reliverse/rengine/preloaded/resources/gta-sa -name '*.ipl' | head -1 | xargs python3 run_cli.py ipl-to-godot | head -20
scripts.ipl-to-godot:analyze: cd app-cli && python3 run_cli.py ipl analyze /home/blefnk/Documents/reliverse/rengine/preloaded/resources/gta-sa/countrye.ipl
scripts.ipl-to-godot:build:extension: echo 'Run this from the generated Godot project directory: ./build_extension.sh'
scripts.ipl-to-godot:setup:godot: echo 'Ensure Godot 4.2+ is installed. Visit: https://godotengine.org/download'
scripts.ipl-to-godot:setup:rust:manual: echo 'Manual Rust installation: curl --proto "=https" --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://sh.rustup.rs | sh'
scripts.ipl-to-godot:info: echo 'IPL to Godot Converter - Converts GTA IPL files to Godot projects' && echo 'Docs: ./IPL_TO_GODOT.md' && echo 'Usage: bun ipl-to-godot:convert:gta-sa'

author: Reliverse
